scripts.build: npm run copyfiles && webpack --config webpack.dev.js && hugo
scripts.serve: npm run copyfiles && webpack --config webpack.dev.js && hugo serve --disableFastRender
scripts.watch: npm run copyfiles && concurrently 'hugo serve --disableFastRender' 'webpack --watch --config webpack.dev.js'
scripts.prod: npm run copyfiles && webpack -p --config webpack.prod.js && hugo
